feedback:
Excellent application of the DRIVER framework throughout your work. You clearly demonstrated 5 stages: D, R, I, V, E.


STRENGTHS:
- Financial APP: The student clearly defined and implemented a working financial application that generates actionable outputs (financial health check, recommended allocations, monthly action plan, projected returns). Discover and Implement evidence shows both the conceptual goal and a concrete implemented tool producing financial tasks and recommendations, meeting the PASS standard.


AREAS FOR IMPROVEMENT:
- Integrate AI: The student clearly integrated AI tools and produced AI-driven personalized investment outputs, showing value beyond a purely static tool (evidence from Discover and Implement stages). However, the submission lacks depth on how the AI models were used, their roles, or technical details of the integration, so it demonstrates correct but basic integration rather than a thorough, detailed treatment required for a full pass.

criteria.criterion_name: Financial APP: The tool functions as a financial application.
evidence: "So I decided to create a personalized investment plan for college students."
"We're going to build our own AI powered financial innovation. I used OpenAI, I used Gemini and I used Streamlit for this project."

"So our financial health check here we have, we currently have one month of expenses saved and here's the actual allocate 100 per month to high yield savings account until you reach three months of savings."
criteria.driver_alignment: Discover (defined the project goal: personalized investment plan for college students) and Implement (built the tool using OpenAI, Gemini, and Streamlit and produced live outputs such as health checks, allocations, and projections), supporting that a working financial application was developed.
criteria.reasoning: The student clearly defined and implemented a working financial application that generates actionable outputs (financial health check, recommended allocations, monthly action plan, projected returns). Discover and Implement evidence shows both the conceptual goal and a concrete implemented tool producing financial tasks and recommendations, meeting the PASS standard.

criteria.criterion_name: Integrate AI: The tool integrates AI capabilities effectively.
evidence: "We're going to build our own AI powered financial innovation. So I used OpenAI, I used Gemini and I used Streamlit for this project."
"So I decided to create a personalized investment plan for college students."
"So here we're going to general generate this personalized plan and here we're going to go through these."
criteria.driver_alignment: [Discover: identified a user-focused problem (personalized plans for college students); Implement: listed specific AI tools used (OpenAI, Gemini) and demonstrated AI-generated outputs (personalized plan, recommendations, and code attached).]
criteria.reasoning: The student clearly integrated AI tools and produced AI-driven personalized investment outputs, showing value beyond a purely static tool (evidence from Discover and Implement stages). However, the submission lacks depth on how the AI models were used, their roles, or technical details of the integration, so it demonstrates correct but basic integration rather than a thorough, detailed treatment required for a full pass.
